entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
